QuestData.Title: To Bor'gorok Outpost, Quickly!
QuestData.Description: Did you feel it?$B$B<Sauranok momentarily clutches his chest in confusion. His hand comes away trailing red-hot steam.>$B$BSomething terrible has happened to my old friend, Farseer Grimwalker. I just sensed it.$B$BHe had a pupil that he took with him when he went north. They were going to help the overlord establish an outpost on the edge of Sholazar Basin.$B$BHer name is Snarlfang. She is a spirit talker.$B$BPerhaps she will know what happened. Or, at least, she can help you to find out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Spirit Talker Snarlfang at Bor'gorok Outpost.
QuestData.RewardText: The mystic knows? You say he felt that something horrible happened to Farseer Grimwalker?$B$BIt is as I feared!
